quote: Now, when WikiLeaks, which I had nothing to do with, comes out and happens to give — they're not giving classified information.
quotePlain: Now, when WikiLeaks, which I had nothing to do with, comes out and happens to give — they’re not giving classified information.
name: Donald Trump

checks.short: Not always. They have released classified information in the past.
checks.shortPlain: Not always. They have released classified information in the past.

checks.short: WikiLeaks actually released [hundreds of thousands](http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2010/11/28/AR2010112802395.html) of classified State Department cables, in a significant blow to U.S. diplomacy.
checks.shortPlain: WikiLeaks actually released hundreds of thousands of classified State Department cables, in a significant blow to U.S. diplomacy.

checks.quote:
During the general election, WikiLeaks released tens of thousands of emails that Russian actors stole from Democratic political operatives. Those emails do not contain classified information, as far as we know.

However, WikiLeaks has certainly released classified information in the past. For example, Chelsea Manning (formerly known as Bradley Manning) made many thousands of classified and sensitive government files public through [WikiLeaks](http://www.politifact.com/truth-o-meter/statements/2017/feb/01/john-mccain/mccain-says-taliban-murdered-people-because-chelse/).
checks.short: WikiLeaks has certainly released classified information in the past.
checks.quotePlain:
During the general election, WikiLeaks released tens of thousands of emails that Russian actors stole from Democratic political operatives. Those emails do not contain classified information, as far as we know.
However, WikiLeaks has certainly released classified information in the past. For example, Chelsea Manning (formerly known as Bradley Manning) made many thousands of classified and sensitive government files public through WikiLeaks.
checks.shortPlain: WikiLeaks has certainly released classified information in the past.

claims.title: Wikileaks information unclassified
claims.truth: Not always. They have released classified information in the past.
claims.truthPlain: Not always. They have released classified information in the past.
